Agreed, it is the best camera to get. =C2=
=A0There are several models available: some have built in IR lights, some h=
ave IR / UV lights, some are set-up for sky watching, and others are just p=
lain ol' full spectrum. 


With this camera (depending on the model, a regu=
lar one with the different options run around $120-150), you will also need=
 the power supply ($12-$20), a tripod, and a portable recorder. =C2=A0My gr=
oup uses 2 of them and each one is attached to a portable DVD recorder that=
 has a small LCD screen, you can find these refurbished for under $100.

im

ectrem does not mean it actually full spectrum the camera i have is the one=
 that ghost adventures,ghost hunter,Bill murpghy etc have...this is the one=
 to get!
